alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Lauderdale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 3:15AM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Lauderdale and western Colbert Counties through 400 AM CDT... At 314 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Walnut Grove, or 8 miles east of Pickwick Landing State Park, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Florence, Muscle Shoals, Sheffield, Tuscumbia, Cherokee, Waterloo, Posey Loop, Mt Hester, Srygley Church and New Bethel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
